name: Echoes (itch) (Silvia M.)
description:
What do you remember?

You wake up in a strange house, your mind a haze of confusion. You need answers, and to find them, you must explore. But you don’t have much time, and there is more than one mystery waiting for you.

Can you find the answers you need? Can you uncover the house’s secrets, and your own?

Echoes is an interactive short story, currently in development, that contains mystery, supernatural and horror elements. Follow the dev blog on Tumblr here.

Explore a mysterious house looking for answers; it’s up to you whether you will find them—or not—before it’s too late.

The protagonist and their past are as much of a mystery as the house itself; you will be able to name them and shape their actions, but here too is a story to be pieced together. Gender and physical descriptions will not be referenced at any point.

The current demo is a teaser, containing the first ~3.5k words of the story which make up the prologue.
